page.title: 14 LOCAL INDUSTRIES (2)
page.content: {MOTOROLA AUTOMOTIVE PRODUCTS. { The Motorola factory is based in {Taylors Rd.in a small industrial area. {It has a workforce of about 470 but {due to a lost contract with British {Leyland this will be drastically {reduced to about 270 in August'85. {The company is}American{owned and {the Stotfold factory mainly produce "In car entertainment units"{(radio {cassette players)Until recently their {main buyer was British Leyland. { The future of the company is in {making electronic ingnition systems. {At present the staff work a double day {shift to produce these,the staff begin {at 6am until 2pm next shift 2pm till {10pm. }The workforce are resigned to the loss of their jobs but hope to be re-employed when more contracts are secured as they quite well payed and live close to the factory.
